desc.p: Identifies the Advisory Charge in Local Currency
Noinput field.
Identifies the Tax applied to the Advisory Charge in Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Date for posting of management fees. Defaults from SAFECUSTODY VALUES value date if process type field is set to 'periodic' otherwise uses today's date. Can be amended by the user.
Standard T24 date field.
Identifies the resultant Customer Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
This field contains the charges that were present before the backvalue transaction that
resulted in the recalculation of fees.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Average Asset Balance to be used in calculating the Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
This field contains the difference between the previously posted charges
and the new charges that have been recalculated.
Noinput field.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a no input, no copy field.
Identfies the Tax Code used in the calculation of the Tax Amount.
Tax Code is extracted from above Charge Code.
Noinput Field.
Identifies the Tax applied to the Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
Identifies the End Period of the Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
The field contains the charges before the charges were recalculated due to a back-value transaction
Noinput field.
Standard T24 field.
Alphanumeric field of length 30.
Noinput field.
Identifies the system calculated Advisory Charge in Local Currency, for this portfolio.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Charge Code or Group to be used for Advisory Charges.
Defaulted from SCPM.GROUP.CONDITION - Tax.Comm.Code
Noinput field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Reason for modification to advisory fees.
Multi-valued field.
Optional input.
Identifies the Exchange Rate between the Tax Amount and the Local Currency.
Noinput field.
This is a standard T24 alphanumeric field of length 30.
This is a noinput and nocopy field.
Upto 30 characters can be entered.
Identifies the Start of the Charge Period for Advisory Charges.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Currency of the Account to be used to post Advisory Charges.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Customer Account to be used to post Advisory Charges.
Defaulted from the SEC.ACC.MASTER-SAFEKEEP.CHRG.ACC
Mandatory Input.

System-maintained field populated only when SAFECUSTODY.VALUES>PERFORM.ACCRUAL is set to DAILY. Recorded to support the reversal of accounting entries following fee reversal after the fee-realisation date.
Identifies the Exchange Rate between : Account Currency and Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Discount Amount to be applied to the the calculated Advisory Charge.
Automatically calculated by the system.
Optional Input.
Indentifies the Period of the Advisory Charge in Months.
Noinput field.
This field contains the customer number for which fees are being posted.
Its a noinput field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a no input, no copy field.
Y/N flag showing whether the advisory fees are ready for posting.
Noinput field.
Standard T24 field.
Alphanumeric field of length 30.
Noinput field
Specifies whether the record was modified after being generated.
The status is automatically updated.
Noinput field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
